on reading compounds: 鬼頭【オニガシラ】decorative black flagpole tassel made from tail hair (of a yak, horse, ox, etc.) or dyed hemp
大纛【タイトウ】large decorative black flagpole tassel made from tail hair (of a yak, horse, ox, etc.) or dyed hemp, emperor's encampment
牙纛【ガトウ】flagstaff decorated with ivory carried by the emperor or a general
kun reading compounds: 鬼頭【おにがしら】decorative black flagpole tassel made from tail hair (of a yak, horse, ox, etc.) or dyed hemp
